effect.more_rpg_classes.molten_armor.des: Reduces armor, armor toughness and damages the target if it wears armor.
effect.more_rpg_classes.frozen_solid.des: Cant move, attack or jump, takes additional damage if hit during active effect.
effect.more_rpg_classes.collected_soul.d: Increases soul spell power per stack.
Reduced Healing and increased incoming damage.
death.attack.mrpgc.molten: %1$s is burned by his molten armor.

advancements.more_rpg_content.root.descr: Explore the different paths you can choose!
enchantment.more_rpg_classes.elemental.d: Increases all kinds of elemental spell damage you deal

enchantment.more_rpg_classes.earth_maste: Increases earth spell damage you deal
